t: Choice Hotels opens Everhome Suites, debuting brand standard prototype | Hotel Dive
s: May 14, 2024 - Choice Hotels International opened the third hotel under its midscale extended stay brand Everhome Suites in Nampa, Idaho, the hotel company announced Monday. The hotel features the brand's Closer to Home design package, including “local community touches,” Choice said in a release.
